page.title: 10Religion
page.content: There is just one church in the area situated at Bagnall This church is Church Of England and was built in the 17th century and will hold up to 70 people. It stands in the main square in the centre of Bagnall and has a big influence on local life. Sunday services are communion in the morning and even song at night with communion services on week day mornings according to whats on in the church calender. Most of the Sunday services are well supported and in particular the church is well decorated and supported for the Harvest Festival. There are few baptisms and weddings because of the area.
